greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sum of all the remainders when n-th even number is divided by even numbers < 2n.
example: a(5) = 8. The remainder when 10 is divided by 4,6,8, respectively is 2,4,2 and their sum = 8.
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jan 29 2002
ext: Corrected and extended by several contributors.
